derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French courtisane, from obsolete Italian cortigiana, feminine of cortigiano 'courtier', from corte (see court)

entry.tran: (旧时伺候富人和有权势之人的)高级妓女
entry.def: In former times, a courtesan was a woman who had sexual relationships with rich and powerful men for money.

means.word_mean: 1. a woman who cohabits with an important man
